hero.title: What's On & Community Events
hero.subtitle: Recurring favourites plus seasonal highlights reflecting Waterbeach village life & Cambridge academic rhythm. Call to reserve or enquire about group space.

regularEvents.title: Order Online (Daily)
regularEvents.description: Order Bhutuwa chicken, momo and Gurkha lager for collection or delivery any day.

regularEvents.title: Live Sports Highlights
regularEvents.description: Sky and TNT Sports fixtures on the big screens, with garden overflow when the sun's out.

regularEvents.title: Sunday Masala Roast
regularEvents.description: Slow-roasted meats brushed with Himalayan spice rub, served until 4:00 PM before curry evening.

contact.title: Book Your Event
contact.description: Planning a private event? Get in touch to discuss your requirements.
